levels.description: Stops attacking, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>; Device effect changes to granting a <$ba.barrier>Barrier</> to the target Operator equivalent to <@ba.vup>{overwrite_ratio:0%}</> of Catherine's Max HP every second (cannot exceed her Talent's limit)
